EmailTemplate.subject: Want to help us pick our NCS staff for 2015?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name}
Remember Your Mentor? Want to pick the NCS staff for 2015? Fancy being a Staffing Assessor?
Get Training and Recruitment experience from our dedicated staffing team.
Sign up to our training on February 2nd @ Manchester Deaf Centre from 6-8pm and then pick assessment dates that suit you. Opportunities for after college, weekends and holidays.
You'll be required to attend assessments from 3.45-5.30pm at a city centre venue, We will try to accommodate your assessment date requests however some of them will be in term time. We require 100% commitment, please bare this in mind when applying for the role.
Deadline to apply is midnight on Wednesday 28th January.
Click here https://docs.google.com/a/the-challenge.org/forms/d/1h3_4Mn9rX0kDvhiTzpfMH7Cc4KWIBJaIrFVjhWcYmhs/viewform?c=0&w=1 to apply.
If you have any problems viewing the link, please contact:
tcs.northwest@the-challenge.org
